# Set up

```{r}
#| label: Packages and Data
#| message: false

library(tidyverse) # general use package
library(lterdatasampler) # package of data sets

data(pie_crab) # crab size data set
```

# Exporatory data visualization

```{r}
#| label: latitude and size plot
# base layer: ggplot
ggplot(data = pie_crab, # data set
       aes(x = latitude, # x axis should be latitude 
           y = size)) +
  geom_point()
```
